speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How the hell are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: Listen up, I need to verify your identity before we go on. Give me your date of birth.

speaker: Agent
text: Great. Now, can you confirm your address?

speaker: Agent
text: Okay, listen here, you owe $500 and I'm not here to play nice. How are you going to pay?

speaker: Customer
text: I plan to pay it online once I check my funds.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, well make it quick because I don't have all day. This isn't a charity!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand. I will try to make the payment as soon as possible.

speaker: Agent
text: You better. I don’t need your excuses; just get it done!

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate your concern, but I will make the payment.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever, just stop wasting my time. Bye!
